original: a comprehensive catalog of official Spanish government sources at all three administrative levels
problem: 64 sources cataloged out of potentially thousands; 20 of 8,131 municipalities = 0.25% municipal coverage. 'Comprehensive' implies near-total coverage.
replacement: a foundational catalog of official Spanish government sources at all three administrative levels

problem: No HTTP validation performed on any URL. assumptions-gaps.md line 24: 'No actual HTTP validation of URLs performed (research-only).' 'Verified' implies HTTP testing.
replacement: Manual curation, research-documented URLs

problem: Forensic audit F-03 found 14 allowlist coverage gaps. 'Complete' implies no gaps exist.
replacement: Allowlist structured (3 tiers + blocklist; 14 gap fixes pending)

original: 20 municipal sedes verified (Tier 1 top cities by population)
problem: No HTTP verification performed. 'Verified' without qualifier implies HTTP validation.
replacement: 20 municipal sedes documented (Tier 1 top cities by population)

problem: Validation was schema-level only (JSON Schema). No HTTP validation of URLs, no content validation, no end-to-end pipeline validation. 'Fully validated' implies all validation dimensions covered.
replacement: schema-validated, machine-readable foundation

original: All Q1 research (AGE, CCAA, municipal sources) has been converted into structured YAML registries
problem: YAML registries capture source metadata only, not the full research content (extraction strategies, CMS analysis, disambiguation logic). 'All' overstates conversion scope.
replacement: Core Q1 source metadata (AGE, CCAA, municipal sources) has been converted into structured YAML registries

problem: Actual denominator is 64 portal URLs (or 157 total URLs). 3/64 = 4.7% coverage. '3/3' notation creates false impression of completeness. Link checker also crashes at URL 12/18.
replacement: live smoke test: 3/64 URLs checked OK (4.7% coverage, avg 229ms)

problem: After AUDIT-04 fix, 2 negative tests were added making actual count 5/5. This line is stale.
replacement: | `tests/unit/test_validators.py` | 5 | 5/5 PASS |

problem: Forensic audit found link_check.py crashes on line ~111. 'All passing' was true only for limited dry-run; false for live extended runs.
replacement: all executable, all passing schema validation (link_check.py smoke-tested on 3 URLs)

original: | G4 | Link checker smoke test | PASS | 3/3 URLs OK, JSONL generated |
problem: Forensic audit reclassified G4 as PARTIAL/MISLEADING. Only 4.7% of URLs tested. Tool had crash bug.
replacement: | G4 | Link checker smoke test | PASS (smoke, 3/64 URLs = 4.7%) | 3 URLs OK, JSONL generated |

original: Local coverage strategy includes at least 20 cities with verified sede electronica URLs
problem: Gate criteria uses 'verified' but no HTTP verification was performed. Gaps document states this explicitly.
replacement: Local coverage strategy includes at least 20 cities with documented sede electronica URLs

problem: 'All verified' without HTTP evidence is misleading. Only research-level documentation was done.
replacement: **PASS** (20 cities, all research-documented)

original: Domain allowlist covers all 3 tiers (AGE, CCAA, Municipal) with explicit blocklist
problem: Forensic audit found 14 allowlist coverage gaps. 'Covers all 3 tiers' implies full coverage within each tier.
replacement: Domain allowlist covers all 3 tiers structurally (AGE, CCAA, Municipal) with explicit blocklist

original: **Tier 1 cities:** 20 (all with verified sede electronica URLs)
problem: Research-documented, not HTTP-verified. Same 'verified' inflation pattern.
replacement: **Tier 1 cities:** 20 (all with research-documented sede electronica URLs)

problem: Denominator concealment. 3 out of 64 URLs tested = 4.7%. '3/3' makes it appear all targets were tested.
replacement: **PASS** (smoke: 3/64 URLs tested OK, 4.7% coverage)

problem: G4 was reclassified as PARTIAL/MISLEADING by forensic audit. '6/6' conceals the G4 issue.
replacement: Gates passed | 6/6 (G4 with caveats -- see forensic audit)

problem: 'Verified' without HTTP evidence. Same pattern as other 'verified' findings.
replacement: Municipal URLs documented | 20

original: All 10 audit findings have been resolved. Gates re-verified: 5/5 PASS.
problem: Code/data fixes applied but downstream documentation not updated. 14+ stale claims remain. 'Resolved' implies full propagation.
replacement: All 10 audit findings have been addressed in source data/code files. Gates re-verified: 5/5 PASS. NOTE: downstream report documents were not updated with post-fix values.

original: Core claims (44 sources, 25 AGE, 19 CCAA, 20 local, 6/6 gates) are all VERIFIED
problem: Same report marks G4 as PARTIAL/MISLEADING on line 103. Internal contradiction: '6/6 gates all VERIFIED' vs G4 PARTIAL.
replacement: Core claims (44 sources, 25 AGE, 19 CCAA, 20 local) are VERIFIED; gates 5/6 VERIFIED + G4 PARTIAL

problem: After AUDIT-04 fix (same report line 175), actual test count is 5/5. Internal staleness.
replacement: All 4 scripts pass, 5/5 tests pass

problem: Same staleness as SF-020. After AUDIT-04, actual count is 5/5.
replacement: pytest tests/unit/test_validators.py -v                # 5/5 PASS

original: AUDIT-01 through AUDIT-10 all marked RESOLVED
problem: Code/data fixes applied but 'RESOLVED' implies full resolution including documentation propagation. 14+ downstream stale claims not updated.
replacement: Mark as RESOLVED (source) or add column 'Doc propagation: PENDING'

original: See `source-registry/local.md` for complete list with verified URLs.
problem: Double inflation: 'complete' (only 20 of 8,131 municipalities) and 'verified' (no HTTP validation).
replacement: See `source-registry/local.md` for the full Tier 1 seed list with documented URLs.

problem: 'Verified' without HTTP evidence. The 20/20 is accurate but 'verified' is inflated.
replacement: Municipal URLs documented | 20/20 (Tier 1) | This research

original: See `source-registry/age.md` for complete list with URLs.
problem: 'Complete list' could be read as 'complete coverage of all AGE sources' when only 25 were cataloged. Mild inflation.
replacement: See `source-registry/age.md` for the full 25-source catalog with URLs.

original: See `source-registry/ccaa.md` for complete list with URLs.
problem: 'Complete list' could be read as 'all CCAA procedures/URLs' not just the 19 community profiles.
replacement: See `source-registry/ccaa.md` for the full 19-community catalog with URLs.

problem: As phase status this is acceptable but without qualification could be read as 'biblioteca is complete' when it is a v0 seed.
replacement: **Status:** COMPLETE (Q1.1 scope delivered)

problem: Example implies data/tramites/imv.json validates against ProcedureDoc.v1 schema, but existing tramites use legacy format. Only proceduredoc.sample.json validates. Running this command would fail.
replacement: python3 scripts/validate_proceduredoc_schema.py "docs/arreglos chat/fase-3/q1-sources/evidence/samples/proceduredoc.sample.json"
